title: 449hp Scuttle smited by 430 smite.

embed.description: 430 smite killed a 449hp scuttle. Slow-mo. REPLAY in ranked game. (DIAMOND)

body:
Fun times in a ranked game when u get a smite bug.
Feelsbadman. 
Just wanted to vent.

replies.body:
It's not a bug.  
Scuttle was snared by Nunu's E.
Scuttle takes 25% extra damage when under the effects of hard CC, including from true damage. Not to mention the loss of resistances too after being CCed.
